tool_description: testimonialapi - A public list of free user customer testimonials
title: testimonial

api_list.name: GetSingleUserTestimonial
api_list.description: Based on ID from 1 to 10 get a particular user data. Note here odd ID is male person testimonial data while even ID is female testimonial data. Below is an example of fetching the first user data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://testimonial.p.rapidapi.com/api/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "testimonial.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetAllTestimonial
api_list.description: Contain up to 10 users data, simple use a GET HTTP request on the link.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://testimonial.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "testimonial.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
